name: Dragonknight Standard
description: Call down a battle standard, dealing 870 Flame Damage every 1 second for 16 seconds to enemies and applying Major Defile to them, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 16%.   An ally near the standard can activate the Shackle synergy, dealing 2639 Flame Damage to enemies in the area and immobilizing them for 5 seconds.
coefDescription: Call down a battle standard, dealing $1 Flame Damage every 1 second for 16 seconds to enemies and applying Major Defile to them, reducing their healing received and Health Recovery by 16%.   An ally near the standard can activate the Shackle synergy, dealing $2 Flame Damage to enemies in the area and immobilizing them for 5 seconds.
